=Summary=

Running while wearing armor builds experience for Light and Heavy Armor.

Increasing Heavy Armor allows players to sprint for longer.

Increasing Light Armor results in being able to move faster overall.

Just about everything is customizable too!

=Installation=

Please extract ArmoredRunning.bsa and ArmoredRunning.esp to Skyrim's Data
folder and ensure the mod is set to load before playing.

=Removal=

Armored Running makes permanent changes to the player character's actor values.

Please be sure to disable these changes using the Armored Running lesser power
or the Mod Configuration Menu before removing the mod.

=Compatibility=

This mod was tested on Skyrim v1.9.32.0.8 and cleaned with TES5Edit v3.0.30.

It does not make any changes to the base game and is entirely script-driven.

It also fully supports SkyUI's Mod Configuration Menu but does not require it
or SKSE.

Will not be compatible with Armord Sprint, because it uses the same reworked
scripts, my limited knowledge prevents
to rewrite and rename everything without breaking it.

=Known Issues=

-Player-enchanted armor must be re-equipped after first loading the mod.
--There is a known issue with Skyrim that prevents custom enchantments from
being applied when items are equipped through script.
